name: Battlefield Zombie Zone
description:
Zombie alarm!

Get your shotgun ready!

Controls:  Move with [W, A, S, D], Shoot with [SPACE], place a mine with [M]

Fight the zombies, using an AK47, a UZI or the classic shotgun.

There also is a gattling gun ;)

Bug: If there are no mines visible or two weapons available, pls reload the page :(
